summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent to accept and execute a grant agreement with the Institute of Museum and Library Services (IMLS) for a General Operating Support Grant for the Woodland Park Zoo; accepting additional funds from the Woodland Park Zoological Society; creating and establishing necessary positions; increasing the expenditure allowances in the 1997 Department Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Parks and Recreation Fund therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
